attributes.action: Pay winter fuel allowances not only to the elderly but to poor families with babies and younger children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst many pensioners who are relatively wealthy in many cases receive up to £400 to help with winter fuel costs, poor families with babies and young children under 5 receive no help and struggle to keep them warm. Babies of the poor need warmth as much as the elderly. The government needs to give additional help to those in receipt of means-tested benefits with children under 5 as a matter of urgency
